### [Category Name]

  - File: `src/path/to/file.tsx`
  - Notes: Additional context

- [ ] **Another task** - Description
  - [ ] Subtask 1
  - [ ] Subtask 2
  - File: `src/other/file.tsx`

### [Another Category]

### [Category]

## Low Priority / Future

- [ ] Future enhancement idea
- [ ] Nice-to-have feature

## Completed

- [x] **Completed task** - What was done
  - File: `src/where/changed.tsx`
  - Completed: 2025-01-15

- [x] **Another completed task**

---

## Task Format Guide

```markdown
- [ ] **Task name** - Brief description
  - [ ] Subtask (optional)
  - File: `src/path/to/file.tsx` (where to make changes)
  - Notes: Additional context
  - Blocked by: Other task (if applicable)
```

**Status meanings:**
- `[ ]` - Not started
- `[x]` - Completed
- Move completed items to "Completed" section with date

---

*Last updated: [Date]*
